name: afterclass
description: AfterClass - Get answers to your questions

scripts.postinstall: ionic plugin add phonegap-plugin-push --variable SENDER_ID="580333274108";ionic plugin add https://github.com/Telerik-Verified-Plugins/Facebook.git --variable APP_ID="776966842380887" --variable APP_NAME="AfterClass";ionic plugin add cordova-plugin-whitelist;ionic plugin add cordova-plugin-camera;ionic plugin add cordova-plugin-file;ionic plugin add cordova-plugin-file-transfer;ionic plugin add cordova-plugin-inappbrowser;ionic plugin add cordova-plugin-splashscreen;ionic plugin add https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-network-information.git;ionic plugin add cordova-plugin-statusbar;ionic plugin add ionic-plugin-keyboard;
